attributes.action: Make David Cameron pay the extra payments to his SPADs from his own pocket
attributes.additional_details: People in the real world get made redundant all the time at no notice and have to take what the rules say (and sometimes don't even get that!).
attributes.background:
David Cameron has forced through additional payments to special advisers being made redundant on his resignation as PM against the advice of the chief executive of the civil service.
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-36808363
If he wants to do favours for mates he should pay for them himself.
